title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama and other LLMs locally via a single CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served locally.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; markdown, code highlight, model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, Android friendly.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate text.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and streaming.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Fork of GPT4All UI that adds an Ollama backend so you can switch between local providers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, CUDA support, and optional web UI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; small surface, streaming friendly.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI that connects to Ollama via REST; dark mode, mobile friendly.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to Ollama.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI for chatting and embedding with local Ollama models.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tips, and integrations around Ollama.

title: Ollama on Hugging Face
summary: Curated list of GGUF models tagged for Ollama with one-click download commands.
